title: Tactical Decision-Making Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Dynamic Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific principles and data visualization interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Microlearning content delivery via smartphones for corporate managers/leaders. Simulates tactical scenarios encountered during work through videos/animations

learning_goals: Learners identify core elements of tactical situations with 80% accuracy within 3 minutes using dynamic visualization materials
Learners explain a decision-making process that minimizes cognitive load in a given tactical scenario in three or more steps
Learners solve simulation problems presented in mobile environments with a success rate of over 70%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
